basics.name: Christopher Nguyen
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: Hi! I'm Chris! I am a junior at the University of Hawaii at Manoa majoring in Computer Science and minoring in Business Administration. After graduating in Spring 2018, I hope to work in software development or project management.

education.institution: University of Hawaii at Manoa, Honolulu, HI

highlights: Used open-source software and seven Raspberry Pis to created an automated 72-inch video wall system.
Conducted high level network assessments for external clients and state agencies.
Developed the website for Ditto, a social media startup in the Blue Startups Accelerator Program.
Conducted extensive consumer research using AB testing and Google Analytics of user behavior.
Recruited and screened 100+ beta testers for Ditto's initial release.
Customized a mobile geographic information system (GIS) application that reduced the damage assessment time of disaster response units by 40% (4-5 hours) using the ArcGIS API.
Developed a cross-platform Customer Relationship Management (CRM) mobile application using the Cordova framework to increase client and consultant interaction by 10%.
Collaborated with 28 schools in the Kaimuki-McKinley-Roosevelt Complex Area to develop a 21st-century STEM curriculum that sparked a 48% STEM interest.
Mentored students in the Honolulu District and Hawaii State Science and Engineer Fair that totalled $15,000+ in awards from Chevron, IEEE, Intel and more.
Taught English to Kindergarteners and painted an entire school courtest of the Hamilton Award Scholarship (2013).
Secretary, Vietnamese Student Organization at UH Manoa, 2016-Present

awards.title: Information and Computer Sciences Award
awards.summary: Awarded at the 2014 Hawaii State Science and Engineering Fair for my project, P.I.P.E. See my portfolio site for more details.

awards.title: Best in Computer Science
awards.summary: Awarded at the 2014 Honolulu District Science and Engineering Fair for my project, P.I.P.E. See my portfolio site for more details.

awards.title: Joanna L. Sullivan Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarship award given to 1 Hawaii student attending the University of Hawaii at Manoa http://www.hawaiirotaryyouthfoundation.org/currentrecipients

awards.title: STEM Award
awards.awarder: Pearl Harbor Naval Shipyard and Maintenence Facility
awards.summary: Scholarship award funded by the National Defense Education Program for academic achievement, participation in FIRST robotics, and dedication to STEM

awards.title: Dean's List
awards.summary: Academic honor given to students with a 3.5 GPA or above. Semesters Received: Fall 2014, Spring 2015, Fall 2015, Spring 2016, Fall 2016
